p: For all sampling sites in both river catchments, the IHA metrics (Figure 2b) were calculated based on the extrapolated gauge data from the 12‐month period prior to the date of the biological sampling (Figure 2a). This period is expected to represent the effects of flow conditions on macroinvertebrates for a sample (Jourdan et al., 2018; Leigh & Datry, 2016). For example, for a macroinvertebrate sample from 21.04.2013, flow data between 22.04.2012 and 21.04.2013 were considered.
